description:
Adzuna is a search engine for job ads that lists every job, everywhere.

Our mission is to be the best place to start looking for a job. We search thousands of websites so you don't have to and bring together millions of ads so you can find every job, everywhere, via Adzuna. We provide smarter search options and powerful data about the job market, giving you the information you need to take control of your career.

jobs.title: Regional Manager - Emerging Markets
jobs.description:
Adzuna is a job search engine that lists every job, everywhere. From launch in the UK in 2011, we now have more than 11 million visitors a month and are busy conquering the world from our international offices. 

Right now, we’re seeking an experienced Regional Manager to join our world class team in helping millions of people find better, more fulfilling jobs. Reporting to the Head of International, the Regional Manager for Emerging Markets will be responsible for developing and growing Adzuna’s job search engine in growth markets like Poland, Russia, South Africa and Italy. 

It’s a general management role combining a strong emphasis on marketing and team management, with elements of strategy, sales, product and operations as well. You’ll grow our emerging markets business aggressively in traffic, revenue and margin terms. You’ll set direction for and manage a talented team of (currently 4) country managers, who are responsible for each of those markets, and dive in and help them when needed. 

You’ll figure out how to adapt our strategy and approach to each country and its unique circumstances while spreading best practises and implementing scalable processes. Your work will help empower jobseekers with better information and ultimately make people’s lives better and the economy more efficient across the globe. 

In return we offer a fun, entrepreneurial working environment within a high-growth business where you can make a huge difference. We offer a competitive package including stock options, professional development and training sessions from industry leaders, and a monthly social calendar all centred in a great West London location. 

Experience: 
1) 5 years of hands-on experience, with broad exposure to online marketing channels like SEO, SEM as well as PR and social media - or a relevant product management, business development or growth role
2) Have managed people effectively and enjoy bringing a team together to achieve results
3) Have had exposure to a multi-country environment and worked in a start-up environment or at a top consulting firm before
4) Experience and success building traffic in markets such as Italy, Poland, Russia or South Africa would be a plus
5) Have a numeric degree at 2.1 or better (or equivalent) from a top university. An MBA would be a plus
6) Have a good understanding of internet business models and the ability to think strategically 


Emerging Markets P&L management
Lead the Emerging Markets business unit to become a fantastic growth engine for Adzuna
Build marketing and business plans, per market, to support the rapid development of free and profitable paid traffic in each market and hit traffic and revenue targets
Work with Head of International to allocate resources required marketing plans and traffic growth 
Set ambitious traffic targets – and then find a way to hit and exceed them
Determine where to focus spend and team time for greatest return on investment across range of activities and marketing channels
Build SEO presence through strong in-house operations, link and content development strategies and outsourcing where appropriate
Create a powerful social media and PR machine and build brand awareness and ‘authority’ status in each market
Optimise SEM spend for each market through a close relationship with the experts in our global marketing team
Work closely with marketing team to manage the balance between global and local marketing initiatives in channels like SEM and PR
Develop with your team a wide and robust network of traffic partners
Test new channels and approaches to jobseeker acquisition and retention and measure and improve performance and efficiency on a week-by-week basis 

Commercial growth and business development: 
Work with Head of International to ensure we achieve sales, revenue and margin targets, and grow a balanced portfolio of clients in each market
Develop our capabilities in new business sales, negotiations, client happiness/success and account management
Support business development around syndication partnerships, API etc. where relevant 
Team management and development 
Retain, develop and motivate a diverse and talented group of country managers and interns, and develop team structure over time
Motivate each individual to grow Adzuna in their own market in a true entrepreneurial spirit, always focusing their talent on activities with maximum business impact
Run weekly meetings and reporting and 1-on-1s
Help develop tools and automation to make the team more effective 

Contribution to Adzuna globally:
Contribute to the International team and overall business strategy, identifying issues that span across markets
Liaise closely with the Marketing & Tech teams to ensure continued world-class user experience for all current and prospective clients
Lead initiatives to grow the global business through strategic partnerships and alliances
Identify new markets to enter and global opportunities to scale up the business outside of the existing market

Benefits:
£50k-£65k base salary depending on experience
Work at a company where you can make a real difference
Exposure to various departments with an opportunity to learn about different business functions
A market-competitive salary, stock options and pension scheme
Entrepreneurial environment in a great new office in Fulham
25 days holiday
Social event calendar and training opportunities

jobs.title: Country Manager - The Netherlands
jobs.description:
About us:

Adzuna is a job search engine that lists every job, everywhere. From launch in the UK in 2011, we now have more than 10 million visitors a month and are busy conquering the world from our office in West London. Right now, we’re seeking a Country Manager to join our world class team in helping millions of people find better, more fulfilling jobs.


The role:

As one of our Country Managers, you’ll report to the Region Manager and lead the way to win the Netherlands and transform the Dutch job search market. Uniquely, Country Managers at Adzuna straddle key business areas of marketing planning, execution and traffic growth, as well as commercial growth, account management and business development.


Based in our great Fulham office, you’ll work collaboratively with a smart diverse team of Country Managers operating 16 internationalised websites, overseeing all aspects of your site’s internet marketing, including; SEO and PPC, blogging, PR and social media. 


Additionally, you’ll have the opportunity to manage and mentor interns, who will support your content needs, whilst liaising closely with the central marketing team who can provide deep channel expertise and help you to align your country’s activities with global strategy.


As our Dutch Country Manager, you’ll grow revenue from our pay-per-click advertisers, from an existing customer base, as well as through the acquisition of new customers. Key to your success will be an ability to monitor the metrics for your site like revenue, profit margin and traffic. You’ll be an integral member of our team, building something to be proud of, whilst becoming a part of one of the fastest growing businesses in Europe. It’s a fun and fast-moving environment. Join us!


About you:
We don’t like to put people in boxes, but you’re likely to be able to demonstrate experience of or aptitude for much of the below:


Commercial growth, Account Management and Business Development:

Demonstrable proven ability to deliver against ambitious traffic targets, and then find a way to hit and exceed them
Strong commercial understanding of internet marketing/advertising business models (CPC, CPA, CPM etc.)
Proven ability to grow and maintain a balanced portfolio of clients through new customer acquisition
Able to deliver against stretching sales and revenue targets
​

Marketing planning, execution and traffic growth:

Can grow a network of traffic partners and affiliates to broaden territory reach
Experience in developing SEO presence through strong in-house operations, link and content development and outsourcing where appropriate
Can build a powerful social media and PR machine and build brand awareness
Have an understanding of how to optimise customer acquisition marketing spend
Able to project manage the delivery of all local marketing initiatives
Tests new channels and approaches, whilst measuring and improving performance and efficiency to maximise growth rate

Other skills that we value:

Fluent in Dutch and English.
You like to roll up your sleeves, be hands-on, entrepreneurial, and thrive on juggling a lot of responsibilities at the same time.
You are highly numerate.
You self-identify as a great communicator with an energetic, action-oriented nature.
You make things happen.

What we offer:

£30k-£40k base salary depending on experience
Work at a company where you can make a real difference
Stock options and pension scheme
Entrepreneurial environment in a great new office in Fulham
25 days holiday
A bursting social event calendar and training opportunities
A fancy coffee machine, gym, ping pong table, maternity pay, bike to work scheme, fresh fruit, Adzuna Academy training program, Apple store discount and lots more

About Adzuna:

Adzuna is a search engine for job ads used by over 11 million visitors per month that aims to list every job, everywhere. We search thousands of websites so our users don't have to, bringing together millions of ads in one place. By providing smarter search options and powerful data about the job market, we give jobseekers the information they need to take control of their careers.   

Adzuna.co.uk was founded in 2011 by Andrew Hunter and Doug Monro, formerly of eBay, Gumtree, Qype and Zoopla and is backed by leading Venture Capital firms Passion Capital, LocalGlobe, Index Ventures and Smedvig Capital.   

We also supply real-time data to the Number 10 Dashboard and Office for National Statistics labour market indices. In 2018, Adzuna won the contract to run ‘Find a job’, one of the British government’s most used online services.   

Adzuna’s mission is to be the best place to start looking for a job. We love using the awesome power of technology to help match people to better, more fulfilling jobs.
